CustomField.description: Account is in Catalyst Circle sub-constituency and has only opted in to communication from the Moms Clean Air Force brand, not from Environmental Defense Fund in general. This field is a workaround until we have a field to track brand opt-ins.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Account is in Catalyst Circle sub-constituency and has only opted in to communication from the Moms Clean Air Force brand, not from Environmental Defense Fund in general.
CustomField.label: Catalyst Circle MCAF-Only
